info.description: The vManage API exposes the functionality of operations maintaining devices and the overlay network

Template.value:
{
   "templateId":"e1f3de23-1ded-49d8-85b1-1e6ab668775f",
   "templateName":"vSmartConfigurationTemplate",
   "templateDescription":"Config template for vSmarts",
   "deviceType":"vsmart",
   "templateConfiguration":
   "system
   host-name         {{Hostname}}
   gps-location latitude {{gps-latitude}}
   gps-location longitude {{gps-longitude}}
   system-ip         {{System-IP}}
   site-id           {{Site-ID}}
   organization-name "Cisco Sy1 - 19968"
   vbond vbond.cisco.com
   aaa
   auth-order local radius tacacs
   usergroup basic
   task system read write
   task interface read write
   !
   usergroup netadmin
   !
   usergroup operator
   task system read
   task interface read
   task policy read
   task routing read
   task security read
   !
        user admin
   password $6$YsNdljyTklJyRlUZ$u.vOqeMSUbzfc.aWBty9OIovNCxlUASviwfgXO2bTCJV5ddUoV7EG8Q3EA3Yl0aMv./GnJLPPbjC6uQPjtwVo.
   !
   !
   logging
   disk
   enable
   !
   !
   !
   omp
   no shutdown
   send-path-limit 8
   send-backup-paths
   graceful-restart
   !
   banner
       login "Cisco SD-WAN/Viptela dCloud Demo V2"
   !
   !
   vpn 0
   dns 198.18.1.1 secondary
   dns 198.18.1.254 primary
   host vbond.cisco.com ip 198.18.1.11 198.18.1.21
   interface eth0
   ip address {{Tunnel-IP-Address}}
   ipv6 dhcp-client
   tunnel-interface
   allow-service dhcp
   allow-service dns
   allow-service icmp
   allow-service sshd
   allow-service netconf
   no allow-service ntp
   no allow-service stun
   !
   no shutdown
   !
   ip route 0.0.0.0/0 {{Default GW}}
   !
   vpn 512
!"
   "factoryDefault":false,
   "configType":"file"
}

data.policyDescription: Baseline dCloud Policy for all WAN Edge

get.description: Get device list by policy Id
Get templates that map a device model
Get templates that map a device model
Get all template vsmart policy list

data.policyDescription: Adding FW for inter-branch communication in VPN 10
Application/ACL Policy for inter-branch traffic in VPN 20
App Aware Routing Policy based on SLA

data.policyDefinition:
policy
data-policy cflowd-policy
  vpn-list vpn_10-20
    default-action accept
  !
!
cflowd-template lab-cflowd-template
  flow-inactive-timeout 10

  flow-active-timeout 60

  template-refresh 600
  collector vpn 10 address 198.18.133.34 port 2055 transport transport_udp
!
lists
  vpn-list vpn_10-20
   vpn 10-20
  !
  site-list cflowd-sites
   site-id 100-400
  !
  
  apply-policy
site-list cflowd-sites
  data-policy cflowd-policy all
  cflowd-template lab-cflowd-template

data.policyDescription: Enforce PCI VPN to be Hub and Spoke per corporate requirements

policy
data-policy cflowd-policy
  vpn-list vpn_10-20
    default-action accept
  !
!
cflowd-template lab-cflowd-template
  flow-inactive-timeout 10

  flow-active-timeout 60

  template-refresh 600
  collector vpn 10 address 198.18.133.34 port 2055 transport transport_udp
!
lists
  vpn-list vpn_10-20
   vpn 10-20
  !
  site-list cflowd-sites
   site-id 100-400
  !
  
  apply-policy
site-list cflowd-sites
  data-policy cflowd-policy all
  cflowd-template lab-cflowd-template
